Summary: Biochemical reaction from bupropion to hydroxybupropion. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2B6.

Controller: AKR1C1, AKR1C2, AKR1C3, AKR7A2, AKR7A3, CBR1, HSD11B1
Summary: Biochemical reaction from bupropion to erythrohydrobupropion. This interaction can be catalyzed by CBR1, HSD11B1, AKR1C3, AKR7A3, AKR7A2, AKR1C2 or AKR1C1.

Controller: AKR1C1, AKR1C2, AKR1C3, AKR7A2, AKR7A3, CBR1, HSD11B1
Summary: Biochemical reaction from bupropion to threohydrobupropion. This interaction can be catalyzed by AKR1C3, CBR1, AKR7A3, AKR1C1, HSD11B1, AKR7A2 or AKR1C2.
Biochemical reaction from threohydrobupropion to threohydrobupropion glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A9, UGT1A4, UGT1A3 or UGT2B7.
Biochemical reaction from bupropion to 4-hydroxybupropion. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP2C19.
Biochemical reaction from erythrohydrobupropion to erythrohydrobupropion glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT2B4, UGT1A3, UGT1A9, UGT2B7 or UGT1A4.
